Riviera Maya Escape

  • Day 1: Arrival in Cancun - Transfer to your luxury resort in Playa del Carmen. Welcome dinner at the resort.
  • Day 2: Full-day tour of Tulum - Explore ancient Mayan ruins and relax on pristine beaches.
  • Day 3: Snorkeling Adventure - Visit the world’s second-largest coral reef. Afternoon at leisure.
  • Day 4: Visit to Coba and Cenote - Guided tour of the Coba ruins, followed by a refreshing swim in a cenote.
  • Day 5: Luxury Catamaran Cruise - Sail to Isla Mujeres, enjoy snorkeling, lunch, and island exploration.
  • Day 6: Spa and Relaxation Day - Indulge in a spa treatment, or enjoy the resort amenities.
  • Day 7: Departure - Transfer to Cancun Airport.

Inclusions

  • Luxury accommodations at a 5-star resort.
  • Daily breakfast, select lunches, and dinners.
  • All transportation, including airport transfers.
  • Entrance fees to all sites and guided tours.
  • Snorkeling equipment and catamaran cruise.
  • Complimentary spa treatment.

Pricing Details

Contact us for the latest pricing and special promotions.

Yucatán Adventure

  • Day 1: Arrival in Merida - Transfer to your boutique hotel. Welcome cocktail reception.
  • Day 2: Merida City Tour - Explore the colonial architecture, markets, and local cuisine.
  • Day 3: Uxmal and Kabah - Guided tour of these lesser-known yet stunning Mayan sites.
  • Day 4: Celestun Biosphere Reserve - Flamingo watching and a boat tour through mangroves.
  • Day 5: Chichen Itza - Full-day tour of the iconic archaeological site, including a traditional Yucatecan lunch.
  • Day 6: Valladolid and Cenotes - Discover this charming town and swim in crystal-clear cenotes.
  • Day 7: Izamal - Visit the “Yellow City” with its striking convent and pyramid.
  • Day 8: Rio Lagartos - Boat tour to see crocodiles, flamingos, and other wildlife.
  • Day 9: Beach Day in Progreso - Relax on the Gulf coast, enjoy seafood, and beach activities.
  • Day 10: Departure - Transfer to Merida Airport.

Inclusions

  • Boutique hotel accommodations.
  • Daily breakfast, select lunches, and dinners.
  • All transportation, including airport transfers.
  • Entrance fees to all sites and guided tours.
  • Boat tours and wildlife watching.
  • Cultural activities and performances.

Pricing Details

Contact us for the latest pricing and special promotions.

Baja California Bliss

  • Day 1: Arrival in Cabo San Lucas - Transfer to your oceanfront resort. Welcome dinner by the sea.
  • Day 2: Cabo San Lucas City Tour - Visit the famous Arch, local shops, and beaches.
  • Day 3: Whale Watching Tour - Seasonal whale watching adventure in the Pacific Ocean.
  • Day 4: Todos Santos Day Trip - Explore this artist colony and its famous Hotel California.
  • Day 5: La Paz and Espiritu Santo Island - Snorkeling, kayaking, and wildlife viewing on a private island tour.
  • Day 6: Wine and Dine in Valle de Guadalupe - Visit vineyards and enjoy gourmet wine tastings and lunch.
  • Day 7: Relaxation and Leisure - Enjoy the resort’s amenities or optional spa treatments.
  • Day 8: Departure - Transfer to Los Cabos Airport.

Inclusions

  • Oceanfront resort accommodations.
  • Daily breakfast, select lunches, and dinners.
  • All transportation, including airport transfers.
  • Entrance fees to all sites and guided tours.
  • Whale watching and island tours.
  • Wine tastings and gourmet meals.

Pricing Details

Contact us for the latest pricing and special promotions.
